description: Creates a new license conversion task.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource you are converting the license type for.

parameters.name: SourceLicenseContext
parameters.description: Information that identifies the license type you are converting from. For the structure of the source license, see Convert a license type using the CLI in the License Manager User Guide. UsageOperation (string) --- The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_params.name: UsageOperation
nested_params.description: The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

parameters.name: DestinationLicenseContext
parameters.description: Information that identifies the license type you are converting to. For the structure of the destination license, see Convert a license type using the CLI in the License Manager User Guide. UsageOperation (string) --- The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_params.name: UsageOperation
nested_params.description: The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_items.name: LicenseConversionTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the created license type conversion task.
